itemDescription: former World's Most Tattooed Senior Citizen (female)

wikipedia_page.main:
Isobel Varley (21 May 1937 – 11 May 2015) was a Guinness World Records-recognized tattooed senior, from Yorkshire, United Kingdom.
She was first named "The World's Most-Tattooed Senior Woman" in 2000.

response: * Isobel Varley (1937-2015), British Guinness Book of World Records recognised tattooed senior
*Isobel Varley, 77, British tattooed woman, world's most tattooed senior, Alzheimer's disease.
